author: Sher Ali Khalti/news Desk
title: 12 cops martyred in bandit attack in Punjab Katcha area
text: LAHORE/KARACHI: In the Katcha area of Rahim Yar Khan, hardened criminals attacked two police vehicles, resulting in the martyrdom of 12 policemen.According to police, the criminals targeted two...

author: Trey Vaughan | tvaughan@joplinglobe.com
title: Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon
text:
Close Webb City‚Äôs Holton Keith helps to hold up a sign celebrating his 1,000th career point on Tuesday night after the Cardinals‚Äô 75-47 win over Lebanon inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School. Keith is joined by his dad, Moni, (behind and to the right of Holton), mom, Cathy (far left) and sister, Whitlee, (second from left) and more family.Globe | Chaz Wright
Landon Fletcher (left), Brody Eggleston, Cohen Epler and Landen Piette pose for a photo with Holton Keith (right) after Webb City's win over Lebanon on Tuesday night. Keith surpassed 1,000 career points in the game.
Globe | Chaz Wright
Featured Webb City's Keith surpasses 1,000 points against Lebanon By Trey Vaughan | tvaughan@joplinglobe.com Jan 23, 2025 Jan 23, 2025 3 min to read Webb City‚Äôs Holton Keith helps to hold up a sign celebrating his 1,000th career point on Tuesday night after the Cardinals‚Äô 75-47 win over Lebanon inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School. Keith is joined by his dad, Moni, (behind and to the right of Holton), mom, Cathy (far left) and sister, Whitlee, (second from left) and more family.Globe | Chaz Wright
Landon Fletcher (left), Brody Eggleston, Cohen Epler and Landen Piette pose for a photo with Holton Keith (right) after Webb City's win over Lebanon on Tuesday night. Keith surpassed 1,000 career points in the game.
Globe | Chaz Wright
A Webb City steal and fast break opportunity led to Joseph Degraffenreid finding Holton Keith underneath the basket for a layup.
It was one of Keith‚Äôs easiest layups of his career. The senior caught the ball flat-footed in front of the block and tossed the ball up for a standing layup with his right hand to put Webb City ahead 37-21 at the 7:15-mark of the third quarter on Tuesday night against Lebanon High School inside the Cardinal Dome at Webb City High School.

author: The Shelby Foundation, Special to Richland Source
title: Shelby Foundation announces investment in historic downtown
text: SHELBY ‚Äî [The Shelby Foundation](https://www.theshelbyfoundation.org/) is taking bold steps to make Shelby shine even brighter. With unanimous support, the Foundation‚Äôs Board of Directors proceeded on Thursday to purchase the former Dick‚Äôs Furniture Building (62 and 64 West Main St.), the current Sutter‚Äôs Home Decorating Building (70 and 72 West Main St.), and the parcel located directly behind at 65 Wall St. After listening to donors, business owners and other citizens, the Board developed a strategic plan that concentrates on building an attractive, strong and secure community. Areas of strategic focus include growth and sustainability, city revitalization, quality of life and economic development. By investing in Shelby‚Äôs downtown buildings, every aspect of the strategic plan is touched upon. ‚ÄúThe Shelby Foundation supports our local nonprofits and infuses them with needed support, and the Foundation will continue to do this,‚Äù said Carrie Kemerer, executive director of the Foundation. ‚ÄúHowever, the Foundation‚Äôs impact is for every person who has walked up and down Main Street, who has a business here, who has come here for dinner and walked in our parks, and, importantly, everyone who hasn‚Äôt yet but will. The positive effects from the Foundation should be felt by everyone.‚Äù Over the years, the Board of Directors has had many conversations about investing in downtown, but when this opportunity presented itself, the timing was right. With so many wonderful things happening in the Shelby community, it was a now or never decision, and the Board asked, ‚ÄúIf not us, then who?‚Äù Forward momentum Board chair, Dr. Marissa Miller, shared her appreciation to Mr. Dennis Pitsch, Mr. Randy Sampsel, and Mr. and Mrs. John Weaver. ‚ÄúThey want what is best for Shelby, and, by partnering with the Foundation, they are doing just that,‚Äù Miller said. ‚ÄúThey are contributing to the forward momentum that will ultimately result in generational change. ‚ÄúThere are so many wonderful things taking place in our community: A new school campus, Black Fork Commons Plaza, new businesses, and the list goes on and on,‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúWith these positive changes happening, this is another area for the Foundation to invest in and make a real difference in the future of Shelby.‚Äù Shelby Foundation wants investment to ‚Äòbe visible‚Äô Location and historical significance were two factors when determining which buildings to purchase. It made sense to acquire and improve real estate on the most heavily trafficked intersection in Shelby. The Board wanted their investment to be visible and is confident it will spur others to join them in this revitalization effort. The Dick‚Äôs Furniture Building and Sutter‚Äôs Home Decorating Building are in the heart of the historic district. According to the original 1834 Shelby Town Plat map, these two buildings are situated on Lot #1. The lots have been reconfigured over the years, but Lot #1 was the first block created when ‚Äúthe town of Shelby‚Äù was laid out. ‚ÄúIt is a clever coincidence that the original block in Shelby and The Shelby Foundation are now connected in this way. Both the location and the Foundation represent legacy and permanence. It was as if this was always meant to be,‚Äù said Kemerer. Next steps: Revitalization and purpose The first step for the Foundation Board was to acquire the buildings. Now that this step is completed, the Board‚Äôs focus can turn to revitalization and purpose. ‚ÄúThere are a lot of unknowns regarding improvements and end use, but as we make decisions, we will share our plans. In the meantime, we hope the community is just as excited as we are about this news,‚Äù Kemerer said. Shelby Mayor Steve Schag shared his enthusiasm for the Foundation‚Äôs enormous investment. ‚ÄúThis is another example of why the city of Shelby is so blessed,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThere is so much positive momentum happening here, and it is noticed by other municipalities around the county. ‚ÄúThe city is thankful to The Shelby Foundation for their bold actions, and we cannot wait to see the end result.‚Äù What's the impact of our reporting? The Community Development Section is dedicated to reporting on the intersection of the private sector and public funding, economic development efforts, and community engagement. We want to know what impact our reporting is having. Please complete this short survey. "*" indicates required fields Community investment made this reporting happen. Independent, local news in Shelby and Northern Richland County is brought to you in part by the generous support of [Phillips Tube Group](https://phillipstube.com/), [R.S. Hanline](https://www.rshanline.com/), [ArcelorMittal](https://northamerica.arcelormittal.com/), [Lloyd Rebar](https://www.lloydrebar.com/), [Hess Industries](http://www.hessindltd.com/), and [Shelby Printing](https://www.shelbyprintingllc.com/).

title: Fiocruz alerta para aumento de infec√ß√µes virais em... | VEJA
text:
Crian√ßas e adolescentes at√© 14 anos formam a popula√ß√£o mais afetada pelo aumento de casos de S√≠ndrome Respirat√≥ria Aguda Grave (SRAG) causada por gripe, covid-19 e v√≠rus sincicial respirat√≥rio (VSR) , segundo alerta do novo Boletim InfoGripe da Funda√ß√£o Oswaldo Cruz (Fiocruz) divulgado nesta quinta-feira, 20. A alta tem rela√ß√£o com a volta √†s aulas e a entidade recomenda que a popula√ß√£o infantojuvenil fique em casa ou saia usando m√°scaras ao apresentar sintomas gripais.
Os dados s√£o referentes ao per√≠odo de 9 a 15 de fevereiro e mostram que, no grupo at√© 2 anos de idade , os epis√≥dios de SRAG foram causados principalmente pelo VSR, causador de bronquiolite e pneumonia . Nesta semana, o Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de anunciou a incorpora√ß√£o de uma vacina e de um medicamento para a condi√ß√£o.
‚ÄúNa faixa et√°ria de crian√ßas e adolescentes, onde a gente tem observado aumento de SRAG desde a semana passada, de modo geral, o crescimento de casos de SRAG est√° relacionado a volta √†s aulas, quando as crian√ßas passam mais tempo em ambientes fechados e em maior contato, favorecendo a transmiss√£o dos v√≠rus respirat√≥rios‚Äù, explicou, em comunicado, Tatiana Portella , pesquisadora do Programa de Computa√ß√£o Cient√≠fica da Fiocruz e do Boletim InfoGripe.
A an√°lise mostrou ainda que os casos de covid-19 t√™m aumentado entre os idosos, popula√ß√£o que deve ser vacinada a cada seis meses , de acordo com a nova estrat√©gia anunciada pelo Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de em dezembro do ano passado.
Recomenda√ß√µes para as crian√ßas e adolescentes Com a circula√ß√£o de v√≠rus, √© importante manter o esquema vacinal em dia , lavar as m√£os e evitar o contato com pessoas que est√£o com sintomas gripais.
Continua ap√≥s a publicidade No caso do VSR, √© fundamental que as pessoas que v√£o visitar beb√™s evitem beijar as m√£os, porque eles levam √† boca, e se aproximar demais. Caso esteja gripado, o ideal √© adiar a visita.
‚ÄúNo caso das crian√ßas e adolescentes, a gente recomenda que os pais ou cuidadores que evitem levar as crian√ßas para a escola, caso elas apresentem algum sintoma de s√≠ndrome gripal. Se n√£o for poss√≠vel fazer esse isolamento com a crian√ßa e n√£o tiver ningu√©m que possa cuidar dela dentro de casa at√© ela se recuperar, a gente recomenda que a crian√ßa ou adolescente v√° para escola usando uma boa m√°scara, se for poss√≠vel‚Äù, diz a pesquisadora.
Vacina contra VSR foi incorporada no SUS Na √∫ltima segunda-feira, 17, o Minist√©rio da Sa√∫de anunciou a incorpora√ß√£o no Sistema √önico de Sa√∫de (SUS) de duas estrat√©gias para combater o VSR : o anticorpo monoclonal nirsevimabe, indicado para proteger beb√™s prematuros e crian√ßas de at√© 2 anos nascidas com comorbidades, e a vacina recombinante contra os v√≠rus sinciciais respirat√≥rios A e B, , dada em gestantes para proteger os beb√™s nos primeiros meses de vida.

author: Paula Tejada
title: M√°laga est√° que arde: los term√≥metros llegan a los 40 grados durante la ma√±ana en municipios de la costa
text:
Noticias relacionadas M√°laga da la bienvenida a agosto con la temperatura m√°s alta de Andaluc√≠a y Espa√±a: √Ålora supera los 44 grados M√°laga empezar√° agosto con avisos amarillos y naranjas por altas temperaturas: se superar√°n los 40 grados Fugaz tormenta de verano en M√°laga: lluvia y barro en diferentes zonas de la provincia El calor no da tregua estos d√≠as en M√°laga. Las temperaturas durante esta ma√±ana de viernes han llegado a los 40 grados en algunas zonas , sobre todo de la costa, seg√∫n los datos de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a. Tal es el calor, que M√°laga ha marcado en esta primera parte del d√≠a ocho de las diez temperaturas m√°s altas a nivel nacional.
El aviso naranja por calor est√° activo en las comarcas de Axarqu√≠a, Costa del Sol y en el Valle del Guadalhorce. Este aviso permanecer√° activo hasta las 21.00 horas, y se espera que los term√≥metros pueden llegar a superar los 40 grados a lo largo del d√≠a.
Los term√≥metros est√°n ardiendo y no hacen m√°s que marcar las temperaturas m√°s altas del pa√≠s en diferentes puntos de la provincia. De esta manera, esta ma√±ana, a las 11.00 horas, en Rinc√≥n de la Victoria han llegado a los 40,2 grados y un rato m√°s tarde, a las 12.40 horas en V√©lez-M√°laga estaban a 40,4 grados . En Algarrobo a las 11.50 horas han llegado a los 38,5 grados.
En el caso de la capital , las temperaturas m√°s altas de esta primera parte de la jornada han oscilado entre los 39 y los 38 grados , marcando sobre las 13.00 horas 38,8 y 38,2 grados en el Centro Meteorol√≥gico y en el Puerto y alcanzando los 39,8 grados en el Aeropuerto.
Por otro lado, en Torremolinos estaban a 38,6 grados tambi√©n a las 13.00 horas y a esa misma hora en Co√≠n han llegado a los 37,7 grados.
Por ello, el 112 incide en que es fundamental beber agua de forma peri√≥dica, cada dos horas como m√°ximo, incluso aunque no se tenga sensaci√≥n de sed. Tambi√©n sostienen que hay que prestar una especial atenci√≥n a personas mayores , enfermos cr√≥nicos y ni√±os peque√±os. Adem√°s, recomiendan las comidas ligeras, fr√≠as y frescas, con alto contenido acuoso, evitando las copiosas y muy calientes.
De igual forma, aconsejan durante las horas centrales del d√≠a cerrar bien las ventanas, cortinas y persianas m√°s expuestas al sol y usar el ventilador o el aire acondicionado. Asimismo, remarcan que se debe evitar salir a la calle en las horas de m√°s calor , y cuando haya que salir usar protecci√≥n solar, sombrero o gorra y gafas de sol homologadas para protegerse del sol. Es mejor vestir con ropas claras y de tejidos ligeros y llevar siempre una botella de agua, tambi√©n en los desplazamientos en coche, para permanecer hidratados.

author: @ACBCOM
title: Ave Mario, contra el bullying | ACB.COM
text: El primer d√≠a de la edici√≥n de Navidad del Campus Gigantes Basket Lover cont√≥ con un invitado de lo m√°s especial. El carism√°tico gamer Ave Mario, jugador de E-Sports profesional de los Cavs Legion, quiso colaborar en el programa de la acb y Endesa "Actuamos contra el Bullying", visitando las sedes de San Jos√© del Parque y Noroeste. Te contamos todo al detalle.‚Äî Campus Gigantes BasketüèÄLover (@CampusGigantes) Gran experiencia con el gamer [@avemario32]en [#SedeSanJosedelParque]y [#SedeNoroeste]en la lucha dentro del programa de [@ACBCOM]'Actuamos contra el Bullying' [https://t.co/vPSmHRWlH3] [#JuntosGigantes] [#BasketLover] [pic.twitter.com/nI5Oe4biKp] [December 27, 2023] Ave Mario comparti√≥ su experiencia con los numerosos chicos y chicas participantes en el Campus Gigantes, relatando su experiencia profesional en Estados Unidos, interes√°ndose por si hab√≠an tenido que experimentar alguna vez una situaci√≥n similar y anim√°ndose a responder cada pregunta de los asistentes, a los que mand√≥ un mensaje de conciliaci√≥n para concienciar sobre los peligros del bullying. Adem√°s de su importante labor social, Ave Mario no dud√≥ en firmar aut√≥grafos o retratarse con sus peque√±os y peque√±as fans, cerrando el acto con una foto de familia para el recuerdo.
